item.title: 高盛下调印尼股票评级，此前MSCI发出警告
item.description: 高盛集团分析师将印尼股票评级下调至"减持"，警告称若该市场被降级为前沿市场，MSCI公司对投资可行性的担忧可能引发逾130亿美元资金外流。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analysts cut Indonesian stocks to underweight, warning that MSCI Inc.’s concerns over investability could trigger more than $13 billion in outflows if the market were downgraded to frontier status.】

item.title: 保险平台Ethos据称将IPO定价于区间中位数
item.description: 据知情人士透露，保险平台Ethos Technologies Inc.将其首次公开募股定价为每股19美元。【原文：Insurance platform Ethos Technologies Inc. priced its initial public offering at $19 per share, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 招聘信息显示，DeepSeek将目光投向人工智能搜索和智能助手领域
item.description: DeepSeek正计划通过推出全新的人工智能搜索功能并加大对智能代理的投入，来拓展其人工智能产品线，从而加剧与OpenAI和谷歌母公司Alphabet Inc.等美国企业的竞争。【原文：DeepSeek is looking to broaden its AI offerings with new artificial intelligence search features and more emphasis on agents, ramping up competition with US firms like OpenAI and Alphabet Inc.’s Google.】

item.title: 日本央行准备推进资产负债表缩减，商业票据利率已降至零
item.description: 日本央行正朝着缩减其庞大资产负债表的目标迈向一个里程碑，其持有的商业票据正趋近于零。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to hit a milestone in its quest to shrink its massive balance sheet, as its commercial paper holdings head toward zero.】

item.title: 莫迪预算案或将提振支出与改革以抵消美国关税
item.description: 在惩罚性美国关税笼罩前景之际，莫迪总理领导的政府可能宣布改善营商环境和增加基础设施支出的措施，同时在即将公布的预算中坚持财政整顿。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government is likely to announce measures to improve the ease of doing business and boost infrastructure spending, while sticking to fiscal consolidation in the upcoming budget, as punitive US tariffs cloud the outlook.】

item.title: 对冲基金Aspex在亚洲基金经理表现亮眼的年份中斩获26%收益
item.description: 李赫尔梅斯管理的140亿美元规模的Aspex Management HK Ltd.在2025年再度实现两位数回报，当时人工智能与公司治理改革推动亚洲各类对冲基金普遍走强。【原文：Hermes Li’s $14 billion Aspex Management HK Ltd. scored another double-digit return in 2025, when artificial intelligence and corporate governance reforms lifted Asia hedge funds large and small.】

item.title: 美国铝溢价首次突破每磅1美元
item.description: 美国市场铝材的区域溢价首次突破每磅1美元，因特朗普政府加征关税导致该金属在国内市场价格上涨。【原文：The regional premium for aluminum delivered to the US market climbed above $1 a pound for the first time as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs make the metal more expensive in the domestic market.】

item.title: 爱德万测试因业绩强劲上调预期后股价飙升
item.description: 爱德万测试公司股价飙升14%至历史新高，此前该公司业绩超出预期并上调了盈利预测。【原文：Advantest Corp. shares jumped as much as 14% to a record high after the company beat earnings estimates and raised its forecast.】

item.title: 台湾保险公司在美元抛售潮前大幅削减离岸对冲头寸
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在美元近期抛售潮来临前，台湾部分大型人寿保险公司已几乎清算了所有离岸货币对冲头寸。此举源于监管改革降低了对冲新台币汇率波动的需求。【原文：Some of Taiwan’s largest life insurers unwound almost all of their offshore currency hedge positions ahead of the US dollar’s recent selloff, as a regulatory overhaul eases the need to protect against swings in the Taiwan dollar, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡维持政策不变 但上调通胀预期
item.description: 新加坡连续第三次维持货币政策不变，但上调了通胀预期，表明价格压力风险仍将是其4月下次决策的关注焦点。【原文：Singapore left its monetary policy settings unchanged for a third straight review, but raised its forecast for inflation in a sign price-pressure risks will remain in focus for its next decision in April.】

item.title: 石峰资本旗下Rinchem寻求困境资产置换以筹措收购资金
item.description: 知情人士透露，由Stonepeak Partners支持的化工物流服务公司Rinchem正要求部分贷款方接受债务减记，作为债务重组协议的一部分，以帮助其完成对Dupré Logistics的收购。【原文：Rinchem, a Stonepeak Partners-backed chemical logistics and services company, is asking some lenders to accept losses as part of a debt deal to help finance its acquisition of Dupré Logistics, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 索尼与新加坡政府投资公司将向音乐曲库投资20亿美元
item.description: 索尼音乐集团与新加坡主权财富基金GIC Pte正组建合资企业收购音乐版权，计划向该项目投资20亿至30亿美元。【原文：Sony Music Group and Singapore’s GIC Pte sovereign wealth fund are forming a joint venture to acquire music copyrights, with plans to invest $2 billion to $3 billion in the project.】

item.title: 令吉升值源于美元疲软之外的诸多因素
item.description: 马来西亚林吉特的持续上涨不仅源于美元的普遍疲软，更受到一系列结构性因素的推动，这表明其升值趋势很可能得以延续。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit’s relentless rally is being driven by a range of structural factors beyond the dollar’s broad weakness, suggesting its gains will likely be sustained.】

item.title: 金价飙升至5500美元上方，货币贬值交易推动创纪录涨势
item.description: 金价飙升至每盎司5500美元以上的新高，延续了此前因美元走弱及投资者大规模抛售主权债券和货币而引发的迅猛涨势。【原文：Gold surged to an all-time high above $5,500 an ounce, extending a breakneck rally fueled by US dollar weakness and a wider flight from sovereign bonds and currencies.】

item.title: 约克太空系统公司通过扩大规模的美国IPO融资6.29亿美元
item.description: 约克太空系统公司通过扩大规模的美国首次公开募股筹集了6.29亿美元，其股票定价处于市场发行区间的最高点。【原文：York Space Systems Inc. raised $629 million in its upsized US initial public offering, pricing its shares at the top of the marketed range.】

item.title: 马斯克称特斯拉需建造“太工厂”生产芯片
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克表示，特斯拉公司需要建造并运营他所称的"TeraFab"来制造半导体。这项耗资数十亿美元的庞大工程标志着该公司又一次向核心电动汽车业务之外的领域扩张。【原文：Elon Musk said Tesla Inc. needs to build and operate what he is calling a “TeraFab” to manufacture semiconductors, a massive undertaking that will cost billions of dollars and mark another expansion beyond the company’s core electric vehicle business.】

item.title: 油价从四个月高点攀升，因特朗普加剧对伊朗威胁
item.description: 油价连续第三日上涨，此前美国总统特朗普警告伊朗必须达成核协议，否则将面临军事打击，这重新引发了市场对中东地区可能出现动荡和混乱的担忧。【原文：Oil rose for a third day after President Donald Trump warned Iran to make a nuclear deal or face military strikes, reviving concerns about potential unrest and disruption in the Middle East.】

item.title: Bumble、Panera Bread、CrunchBase、Match遭遇网络攻击
item.description: Bumble公司、Panera Bread公司、Match集团和CrunchBase公司遭遇了网络攻击浪潮，网络安全专家警告称新一轮针对美国企业的社会工程学攻击正在展开。【原文：A wave of cyberattacks has hit Bumble Inc., Panera Bread Co., Match Group Inc., and CrunchBase Inc., as cybersecurity experts warn about a new round of social engineering attacks targeting US companies.】

item.title: 惠誉分析师库尔顿称日本抛售潮反映全球债券供应过剩
item.description: 惠誉评级首席经济学家指出，上周日本国债抛售及其引发的全球连锁反应，反映出市场对庞大政府债务供应的担忧——这种担忧因央行缩表而加剧。【原文：Japan’s bond selloff last week and its global ripples reflect wariness at a huge supply of government debt exacerbated by central bank balance-sheet reduction, according to the chief economist of Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 挪威2.2万亿美元主权财富基金减持美国科技巨头股票
item.description: 根据最新公布的持股清单，挪威规模达2.2万亿美元的主权财富基金在2025年下半年减持了美国最大科技公司的股份，其中包括其最大持股公司英伟达公司。【原文：Norway’s $2.2 trillion sovereign wealth fund trimmed its stakes in the biggest US tech firms, including its top holding Nvidia Corp., in the second half of 2025, according to a newly published list of holdings.】

item.title: 三星芯片利润飙升，人工智能推动存储器市场蓬勃发展
item.description: 三星电子旗下芯片部门在12月季度的利润激增逾五倍，远超市场预期，这得益于人工智能热潮的推动。该公司同时宣布将斥资25亿美元回购股票。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s chip unit blew past expectations with a more than five-fold profit gain in the December quarter, boosted by an artificial intelligence boom, and announced a $2.5 billion buyback.】

item.title: Joby Aviation计划通过股票和可转换债券融资10亿美元
item.description: Joby Aviation公司正通过出售股票和可转换债券筹集10亿美元资金，这家空中出租车公司计划到2027年将生产能力翻一番。【原文：Joby Aviation Inc. is raising $1 billion from the sale of shares and convertible bonds, as the air taxi company seeks to double production capacity by 2027.】

item.title: 美联储按兵不动，日元走弱，股市债市持稳：市场综述
item.description: 美联储如预期维持利率不变后，美国股市和国债普遍持稳，而多家科技巨头的财报表现参差不齐。随着日元走弱，美元收复了近期跌势。【原文：US stocks and Treasuries were broadly stable after the Federal Reserve held rates as expected, while a slew of mega-cap tech results were mixed. The dollar pared its recent slump as the yen weakened.】

item.title: 野村证券力压高盛，在日本并购交易创纪录之年登顶榜首
item.description: 野村控股公司在2025年重夺日本并购交易顾问业务榜首，当年日本相关交易额创下历史新高。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. took back the top spot in advising on Japanese mergers and acquisitions in 2025 when deals related to the country hit a record.】

item.title: PicPay定价美国IPO，创2021年以来巴西企业首次上市最高价
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富豪巴蒂斯塔家族控股的金融科技公司PicS NV在美国首次公开募股中筹集了4.34亿美元，这是巴西企业四年来首次实现重大上市。【原文：PicS NV, the fintech controlled by the billionaire Batista family, raised $434 million in a US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, in the first significant debut for a Brazilian company in more than four years.】

item.title: 第一量子矿业称正为土耳其铜矿物色买家
item.description: 知情人士透露，第一量子矿业公司正计划出售其在土耳其的铜锌矿，以期增强公司资产负债表的实力。【原文：First Quantum Minerals Ltd. is looking to sell its copper and zinc mine in Turkey as it seeks to strengthen its balance sheet, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 美元跳涨创11月以来最大涨幅，贝森特言论终止跌势
item.description: 美元创下自11月以来最大单日涨幅，结束连续一周的跌势。此前美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特表示，政府支持美元走强。【原文：The dollar posted its biggest one-day gain since November, halting a week of declines after US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the administration supports a stronger currency.】

item.title: 巴西维持利率在15%不变，高通胀令降息空间受限
item.description: 巴西央行在2026年首次政策会议上维持基准利率不变，该利率处于近二十年高位，但承诺将在3月的下次会议上开始降息。【原文：Brazil’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged at a nearly two-decade high at its first policy meeting of 2026, but promised to start cutting it at its next meeting in March.】

item.title: 据称Steel Partners以每股18美元报价收购InMode 51%股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Steel Partners Holdings LP已提出收购InMode Ltd.多数股权的要约。InMode Ltd.是一家生产微创身体治疗设备的制造商。【原文：Steel Partners Holdings LP has made an offer to buy a majority stake in InMode Ltd., which makes devices for minimally invasive body treatments, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 微软股价下跌，云业务增长放缓，支出创纪录
item.description: 微软公司支出飙升至历史新高，云业务销售增速放缓，导致股价下跌。投资者担忧该公司的人工智能投资可能需要更长时间才能见效。【原文：Microsoft Corp.’s spending surged to a record high and cloud sales growth slowed, sending the shares down amid investor concerns that it could take longer than expected for the company’s AI investments to pay off.】
